addTokenDataStream(address,address).custom:security: Only the owner should be able to add data streams
addTokenDataStream(address,address).details: Adds a token data stream to the factory

params._dataStream: Address of the data stream contract

createLendingPool(address,address,uint25.custom:security: Only authorized addresses should be able to create pools

returns._0: Address of the newly created lending pool

getInterestRateModel(address).details: Returns the interest rate model address for a specific lending pool

returns._0: Address of the interest rate model contract

isHealthy().details: Returns the address of the health check contract

owner().details: Returns the owner address of the factory

poolCount().details: Returns the total number of pools created

returns._0: Number of lending pools created by this factory

tokenDataStream(address).details: Returns the data stream address for a token

returns._0: Address of the data stream contract

addTokenDataStream(address,address).notice: This function registers a new token data stream

createLendingPool(address,address,uint25.notice: This function deploys a new lending pool with specified parameters
